review_text: The new credit card application process was incredibly smooth and fast. Approved within minutes!
I've been a loyal customer for 15 years, but the recent fee increases are making me consider switching to another provider.
Customer service was unhelpful when I disputed a fraudulent charge. Took weeks to resolve.
Love the cashback rewards program! I earn points on every purchase and the redemption process is simple.
The mobile app crashes frequently and I can't access my account when I need it most.
Outstanding fraud protection - they caught suspicious activity immediately and blocked my card.
The interest rates on personal loans are way too high compared to competitors.
Quick response time when I needed to report a lost card. New card arrived within 2 business days.
The online banking platform is outdated and difficult to navigate. Needs a major update.
Excellent international transaction support. No issues using my card abroad.
Hidden fees everywhere! They charge for everything - transfers, statements, even customer service calls.
The investment advisory team provided great guidance for my retirement planning.
Terrible experience with mortgage application. Slow processing and poor communication throughout.
The contactless payment feature works perfectly. Very convenient for daily purchases.
Been trying to reach customer support for 3 days about an error on my statement. No callback yet.
Premium card benefits are excellent - airport lounge access and travel insurance included.
The budgeting tools in the mobile app have really helped me manage my finances better.
Disappointed with the savings account interest rates. Much lower than what was advertised.
Fast and secure transactions every time. Never had any issues with payment processing.
The debt consolidation loan helped me get back on track financially. Great rates and terms.
Website security seems weak. I'm concerned about my personal financial information.
Automatic bill pay feature is a lifesaver. Never miss a payment anymore.
The annual fee for this card is not worth the limited benefits provided.
Exceptional service when I needed emergency cash advance while traveling overseas.
The credit score monitoring tool is inaccurate and updates too slowly compared to other services.
